      on the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store, though has since been modified by the Embry-Riddle administration \

      Each hotspot is themed around different subjects, such as food, people, or language basics.',imgStart:'',heroimg:false,img:'images/hotspot.gif',alt:'Hotspot Module'};export var practiceMode={exactClassName:'home__hero-section home__hero-section-gif lightBg',lightText:false,lightTextDesc:false,topLine:'',headline:'Study for a Test or Refresh Your Memory',description:'Players are able to review words they have already learned in practice mode.',imgStart:'',heroimg:false,img:'images/practicemode.gif',alt:'Practice Mode Module'};export var userInformation={exactClassName:'home__hero-section home__hero-section-gif lightBg',lightText:false,lightTextDesc:false,topLine:'',headline:'See Your Progress!',description:'Players can see their experience and level in different subjects of the Mandarin language.',imgStart:'',heroimg:false,img:'images/userinfomode.gif',alt:'User Info Module'};export var personalRole={exactClassName:'home__hero-section home__hero-section darkBg',lightText:true,lightTextDesc:true,topLine:'Personal Role',headline:'Project Manager & Team Member',description:'As project manager, I planned and scheduled all tasks within the project, assigning weekly tasks to \
      team members to effectively meet deadlines and produce a minimum viable product within 12 weeks. \n\n \
      As a team member on this project, I created the JSON file databases to organize subjects, categories, and \
      vocab words for the application, the C# scripts to read the JSON files into the application, and the system \
      controlling which subject, category, and vocab words are selected when visiting a hotspot or using practice \
      mode. I also created the functionality behind displaying different questions, randomizing questions, randomizing \

      answer questions correctly.',imgStart:'',heroimg:true,img:'images/headshot.png',alt:'Personal Headshot'};export var development={exactClassName:'home__hero-section home__hero-section-project home__hero-section-end darkBg',lightText:true,lightTextDesc:true,topLine:'Creation of Lunar Languages',headline:'Development',description:'Lunar Languages was developed using the Unity game engine, combined with the software development \
       kits Mapbox, which provides accurate renditions of the player’s environment and real-time tracking \
       of their position, and ARCore, a Google developed plug-in allowing for access to player camera and \
       the superimposition of images onto the player’s view. \n\n \
       All coding scripts were written in C#; 3D models were created and animated in Blender; and other \
       art and images were created using Clip Studio Paint, Adobe Illustrator, and Procreate.',imgStart:'',heroimg:true,img:'images/unity-mwu-white.png',alt:'Made with Unity'};

sourcesContent:
export const aboutLunarLanguages = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section-project darkBg',
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Fall 2020 - Spring 2021',
    headline: 'Lunar Languages',
    description:
      'Developed by six students as their senior capstone project, Lunar Languages provides an immersive \
       language-learning experience, allowing users to learn Mandarin Chinese by walking to augmented reality \
      (AR) hotspots located around the Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University Prescott campus.\n\n\
      The project was designed during Fall 2020 and developed during the Spring 2021 semester. The app was released \
      on the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store, though has since been modified by the Embry-Riddle administration \
      outside of the work of the original team.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: true,
    img: 'images/lunarlogo.png',
    alt: 'Lunar Languages Logo'
  };

  export const locationTracking = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section-gif lightBg',
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'How to Play',
    headline: 'Walk Around Campus',
    description:
      'Players can view their environment and their position, as well as nearby hotspots, via a top-down map. \
       They will be notified if they walk outside the campus boundary.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: false,
    img: 'images/map.gif',
    alt: 'Map Module'
  };

  export const hotspots = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section-gif lightBg',
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: '',
    headline: 'Visit Hotspots to Learn New Words',
    description:
      'When near a hotspot, the player can click on the hotspot icon to open AR mode to learn new words. \
      Each hotspot is themed around different subjects, such as food, people, or language basics.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: false,
    img: 'images/hotspot.gif',
    alt: 'Hotspot Module'
  };

  export const practiceMode = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section-gif lightBg',
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: '',
    headline: 'Study for a Test or Refresh Your Memory',
    description:
      'Players are able to review words they have already learned in practice mode.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: false,
    img: 'images/practicemode.gif',
    alt: 'Practice Mode Module'
  };

  export const userInformation = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section-gif lightBg',
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: '',
    headline: 'See Your Progress!',
    description:
      'Players can see their experience and level in different subjects of the Mandarin language.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: false,
    img: 'images/userinfomode.gif',
    alt: 'User Info Module'
  };

  export const personalRole = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section darkBg',
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Personal Role',
    headline: 'Project Manager & Team Member',
    description:
      'As project manager, I planned and scheduled all tasks within the project, assigning weekly tasks to \
      team members to effectively meet deadlines and produce a minimum viable product within 12 weeks. \n\n \
      As a team member on this project, I created the JSON file databases to organize subjects, categories, and \
      vocab words for the application, the C# scripts to read the JSON files into the application, and the system \
      controlling which subject, category, and vocab words are selected when visiting a hotspot or using practice \
      mode. I also created the functionality behind displaying different questions, randomizing questions, randomizing \
      answers, checking for the correct answer when selected, and updating the player’s experience and level as they \
      answer questions correctly.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: true,
    img: 'images/headshot.png',
    alt: 'Personal Headshot'
  };

  export const development = {
    exactClassName: 'home__hero-section home__hero-section-project home__hero-section-end darkBg',
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Creation of Lunar Languages',
    headline: 'Development',
    description:
      'Lunar Languages was developed using the Unity game engine, combined with the software development \
       kits Mapbox, which provides accurate renditions of the player’s environment and real-time tracking \
       of their position, and ARCore, a Google developed plug-in allowing for access to player camera and \
       the superimposition of images onto the player’s view. \n\n \
       All coding scripts were written in C#; 3D models were created and animated in Blender; and other \
       art and images were created using Clip Studio Paint, Adobe Illustrator, and Procreate.',
    imgStart: '',
    heroimg: true,
    img: 'images/unity-mwu-white.png',
    alt: 'Made with Unity'
  };
